content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Zero Trust Secure Access Internet Access supports NTLM v2 authentication Zero Trust Secure Access Internet Access now supports transparently authenticating end users on your on-premises Active Directory server using the NTLM v2 protocol, with an Internet Access On-Premises Gateway acting as the authentication proxy server. For more information, see Global settings. Zero Trust Secure Access → Secure Access Configuration → Internet Access and AI Service Access Configuration © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base

metadata.title: Zero Trust Secure Access Internet Access supports NTLM v2 authentication
